General.Name: Schwager
General.Description: Schwager S.A. engages in the mining and renewable energy businesses in Chile. It also offers support and maintenance services to the mining plants; and supplies electrical equipment. The company is also involved in the development, construction, operation, and maintenance of energy projects; and provision of warehouse and logistics services, including import and export cargo, and containers. In addition, it provides dairy products, including powdered milk, crystallized serum powder, protein concentrate, and formulations and food mixes. The company was formerly known as Schwager Energy S.A. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
